p: No patients progressed to accelerated phase or blast crisis CML, or died during this study. Adverse events (all grades) were reported in 55 patients (57.3%) in the safety analysis set in the consolidation phase, and 30 patients (38.7%) in the full analysis set in the TFR phase; the incidence of grade 3/4 adverse events was 14.6%, and 2.6% in the safety analysis set and full analysis set, respectively ( Online Supplementary Table S2).
